quote: Se l'acqua scarseggia, la papera non galleggia.
author: probably a great sage

quote: Never make anything more accurate than it needs to be.
author: Enrico Fermi

quote: Gentlemen, we have run out of money. It's time to start thinking.

quote: If I could remember the names of all these particles, I'd be a botanist.
author: Enrico Fermi

quote: It is nice to know that computers undertand the problem. But I would like to understand it too
author: Eugene Wigner

quotes: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

quotes: Given enough eyeballs, all bugs are shallow.

quotes: If Microsoft ever does applications for Linux it means I've won. (spoiler: it did)

quotes: See, you not only have to be a good coder to create a system like Linux, you have to be a sneaky bastard too.

quotes: There are only two kinds of languages: the ones people complain about and the ones nobody uses.
